Name: Protein
Description: Increases a Pokes Attack by 1. A Poke is only capable of having a single Vitamin.

Name: Iron
Description: Increases a Pokes Defense by 1. A Poke is only capable of having a single Vitamin.

Name: Calcium
Description: Increases a Pokes Special Attack by 1. A Poke is only capable of having a single Vitamin.

Name: Zink
Description: Increases a Pokes Special Defense by 1. A Poke is only capable of having a single Vitamin.

Name: Carbos
Description: Increases a Pokes Speed by 1. A Poke is only capable of having a single Vitamin.

Name: HP Up
Description: Increases a Pokes HP by 1. A Poke is only capable of having a single Vitamin.

Name: Pokedex
Description: A hand-held computer with an advanced camera and image recognition software given to trainers at the start of their journey

Name: Old Rod
Description: Can be used to seach for Pokes in water. It does not look very sturdy.

Name: Good Rod
Description: Can be used to seach for Pokes in water

Name: Super Rod
Description: Can be used to seach for Pokes in water. Shiny!

Name: Escape Rope
Description: Can be used to Escape Wild Battle without a check

Name: Binoculars
Description: Removes 1 setback die due to distance

Name: Flashlight
Description: Removes 1 setback die due to darkness

Name: Flint and steel
Description: Downgrade the difficulty of survival check to make fire

Name: Lantern
Description: Removes 2 setback die due to darkness

Name: Thieves Tols
Description: Allows the ability to pick locks

Name: Honey
Description: Attracts a random Poke native to the area

Name: Great Ball
Description: Gain a blue on capture attemps

Name: Ultra Ball
Description: Downgrade the difficulty on capture attempts

Name: Fast Ball
Description: Downgrade the difficulty on capture attempts three times if using against a poke with 3 speed or more

Name: Lure Ball
Description: Downgrade the difficulty on capture attempts three times if target is in water outside of battle

Name: Heavy Ball
Description: Downgrade your capture attempt if target poke weights less than 100 kg, Downgrade the difficulty on capture if target Poke weighs 200 kgs < 300 kgs, Downgrade the difficulty on capture three times if target Poke weighs if 300 kgs or higher

Name: Love Ball
Description: Lower the difficulty by one and downgrade the difficulty on capture attempts four times if target is same species as your active poke and they are different genders

Name: Multi Ball
Description: Downgrade the difficulty on capture attempts twice if target has multiple heads

Name: Net Ball
Description: Downgrade the difficulty and add a blue on capture attempts two times if target is Water or Bug Type Poke

Name: Dive Ball
Description: Downgrade the difficulty and add a blue on capture attempts two times if target is in water

Name: Nest Ball
Description: Downgrade the difficulty and add a blue on capture attempts two times if target is a baby Poke

Name: Trap Ball
Description: Downgrade the difficulty on capture attempts twice if used in a forest or if target Poke is Normal Type

Name: Faraday Ball
Description: Downgrade the difficulty and add a blue on capture attempts two times if target is Electric or Steel Type Poke

Name: Repeat Ball
Description: Downgrade the difficulty and add a blue on capture attempts two times if you have a Poke of the same speciaes as the target

Name: Timer Ball
Description: If used on round 1 or outside of battle downgrade you capture attempt once. If used in round 3, 5, or 7 gain a blue on your capture attempt. If used on round 4 or 5 of battle downgrade the difficulty once, twice on rounds 6 and 7, and 3 times if used on or after round 8

Name: Premier Ball
Description: Gained for free if you buy 10 balls at once

Name: Dusk Ball
Description: Downgrade the difficulty on capture attempts twice if used in a cave or at night

Name: Heal Ball
Description: Fully heals target Poke when caught

Name: Quick Ball
Description: Downgrade the difficulty on capture attempts four times if used round 1 of battle

Name: Dream Ball
Description: Downgrade the difficulty on capture attempts three times if target is asleep

Name: Heal Powder
Description: Removes all Status Effects from a Poke. Tastes Bad.

Name: Revival Herb
Description: Revives a feinted Poke And heals all their wounds and Strain. Tastes Bad.

Name: Full Restore
Description: All HP and non-volatile Status Effects

Name: Full Heal
Description: Removes all Status Effects from a Poke.

Name: Revive
Description: Revives feinted Poke and heals Wounds and strain down to half their threshold rounded up.

Name: Max Revive
Description: Revives a feinted Poke And heals all their wounds and Strain. Tastes Bad.

Name: Ability Shield
Description: Holder cannot have their abilities changed other Pokes

Name: Absorb Bulb
Description: Once per battle if the holder is hit by a Water type move Wax 1

Name: Cell Battery
Description: Once per battle if the holder is hit by a Electric type move Hone 1

Description: Once per battle if the holder is hit by a Water type move Encourage 1

Name: Snow Ball
Description: Once per battle if the holder is hit by a Ice type move Hone 1

Name: Air Balloon
Description: Holder is Airborn until hit by a damaging Move

Name: Amulet Coin
Description: Doubles the money gained from trainer battles is doubled if the holder is used in the battle

Name: Assault Vest
Description: At the begining of battle the holder gains Encourage 2 but they can no longer use non-damaging Moves

Name: Think Club
Description: At the begining of battle the holder gains Hone 1 or Hone 2 if the are Cubone

Name: Big Root
Description: When the holder recovers wounds from a Move they recover 1 additional

Name: Binding Band
Description: The DOT condition applied by the holder deal an aditional Wound

Name: Grip Claw
Description: The holders Moves with the Dot Property gain an additional rank

Description: The holders Flighting Type Moves have their base damage increased by 1

Description: The holders Dark Type Moves have their base damage increased by 1

Description: The holders Fairy Type Moves have their base damage increased by 1

Name: Black Sludge
Description: At the begining of each turn, if the Holder is Poison Type they Heal 1 wound. Otherwise they recieve 1 wound.

Name: Blunder Policy
Description: If the holders Move check fails and the Move had the inaccurate quality the holder gains Haste 2

Name: Weakness Policy
Description: When the holder suffers wounds from a Move it has weakness to Hone 2 and Wax 2

Name: Choice Band
Description: The first Move used by the holder has its base damge increased by 3 and gains the Locked In Property for the rest of the battle

Name: Choice Scarf
Description: At the beginning of battle the holder gains Haste 2 and the first their first Move used gains the Locked In Property for the rest of the battle

Name: Choice Specs
Description: At the beginning of battle the holder gains Wax 2 and the first their first Move used gains the Locked In Property for the rest of the battle

Name: Clear Amulet
Description: The holder is immune to Slow, Dull, Wane, Erode, and Discourage properties from sources other than itself

Name: Covert Cloak
Description: The holder is immune to all Properties from sources other than itself

Name: Damp Rock
Description: If the holder would cause Rain it becomes Heavy Rain instead

Name: Heat Rock
Description: If the holder would cause Harsh Sunlight it becomes Extremly Harsh Sunlight instead

Name: Icy Rock
Description: If the holder would cause Hail it becomes Hail Storm instead

Name: Smooth Rock
Description: If the holder would cause Sandstorm it becomes Dust Devil instead

Name: Terrain Extender
Description: Upgrade the difficulty to remove Battlefild Effects made by the holder

Name: Destiny Knot
Description: If the holder becomes Infatuated the Poke that caused it is also gains Infatuated

Name: Eject Button
Description: Once per battle when the holder recieves wounds from a Move with a range of engaged their trainer may take the switch action.

Name: Eject Pack
Description: Once per battle when the holder would be subject to Slow, Dull, Wane, Erode, or Discourage properties their trainer may take the switch action. If they do do not apply any Properties from the triggering source.

Name: Electric Seed
Description: If the battlefield gains Electric Terrain the Holder gains Fortify 1

Name: Grassy Seed
Description: If the battlefield gains Grassy Terrain the Holder gains Fortify 1

Name: Misty Seed
Description: If the battlefield gains Misty Terrain the Holder gains Encourage 1

Name: Psychic Seed
Description: If the battlefield gains Psychic Terrain the Holder gains Encourage 1

Name: Eviolite
Description: If the holder has the evolution Talent in their active Specailization increase their Defense and Special Defense by 2

Name: Expert Belt
Description: Moves used by the holder have their base damage increased by 1 if their targe is weak to the Moves Type.

Name: Flame Orb
Description: Holder gains the Burned Status Effect at the end of each of their turns

Name: Toxic Orb
Description: Holder gains the Poisoned 2 Status Effect at the end of each of their turns

Name: Life Orb
Description: Holders moves have their damage increased by 1 but sufferes 1 wound at the end of their turn

Name: Focus Band
Description: If the holders wounds exceed their wound treshold by 2 or less, they do not feint untill after their next turn or they take another wound which ever happens first.

Name: Focus Sash
Description: The Holder cannot take more wounds than their Wound Threshold from a single Move

Name: Lagging Tail
Description: The holder always acts last each round. If multple Pokes hold this item the roll initutive normally but all others go before them.

Name: Heavy-Duty Boots
Description: The holder is immune to Terrain and Entry Hazzards

Name: Iron Ball
Description: At the begining of battle the holder gains Slow 2 and is gounded as long as they hold it.

Name: Kings Rock
Description: The holders damaging Moves gain the Flinch Property

Name: Leek
Description: Holder gains advantage on all move checks or two advantage if holder is Farfetch'd

Name: Lucky Punch
Description: Holder gains advantage on all move checks or two advantage if holder is Chansey

Name: Razor Claw
Description: Holder gains two advantage on all move checks

Name: Scope Lens
Description: Holder gains two advantage on all move checks

Name: Leftovers
Description: Holder heals 1 wound at the end of each of their turns

Name: Loaded Dice
Description: Moves the holder uses with the linked property gain 2 free activations of the quality and have the rank of the quality increase by 1

Name: Lucky Egg
Description: Holder gains an addional 5xp after each battle they participate in

Name: Metronome
Description: After the holder makes a Move check add 1 base damage to the Move that was used and removes the bonus gratnted by this item to all the holders other Moves

Name: Mirror Herb
Description: Once per battle the holder can copy a stat increase used by an opponent

Name: Protective Pads
Description: Holder does not trigger effects that require an enemy to attack in engaged range

Name: Punching Gloves
Description: Moves the holder uses with Punch in the name have their base damage increased by 1

Name: Quick Claw
Description: Once per battle the holder can add the Quickness Property to a Move

Name: Razor Fang
Description: Add Flinch Property to all the holders Moves

Name: Red Card
Description: Once per battle when the holder suffers wounds from an enemy that enemy must be swapped out if possible

Name: Rocky Helmet
Description: When holder recives wounds from a Move with Range of engaged the user also suffers 1 wound

Name: Room Service
Description: When the holder is subject to Trick Room Slow 1 befor the effect of Trick Room

Name: Safety Goggles
Description: Holder does not take damage from Sandstorm and Is immune to Properties of Spore and Powder Moves

Name: Shed Shell
Description: Holder is immune to Properties activated by swapping

Name: Shell Bell
Description: When the holder inflicts wounds they heal 2 wounds

Name: Sticky Barb
Description: Holder suffers 1 wound at the end of each round. Is the holder is hit by a Move with range of engaged sticky barb is taken from the holder.

Name: Throat Spray
Description: Once per battle when the holder uses a Move with the volcal Property Wax 1

Name: Utility Unbrella
Description: Holder is immune to Rain, Heavy Rain, Harsh Sunlight, and Extremly Harsh Sunlight

Name: Wide Lens
Description: Holders Moves gain Accurate 1 if they already have Accurate increase its rank by 1

Name: Zoom Lens
Description: If the target of the Holders Move check has already gone this round the Move gains Accurate 2 if they already have Accurate increase its rank by 2
